h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
content: Next, search the far right side of this sandy area above the slope, until you come to the farthest edge by the rocks. Here you’ll find another wooden chest, and inside you can grab a **Mind Core** , 4 **Yaoguai Core** , and 523 **Will**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Sandgate Bound'.
The content is as follows:
Next, search the far right side of this sandy area above the slope, until you come to the farthest edge by the rocks. Here you’ll find another wooden chest, and inside you can grab a **Mind Core** , 4 **Yaoguai Core** , and 523 **Will**.
